casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Griffin Thomas WILLIAMS, Jr., Defendant-Appellant. No. 29219

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 2, 1970. William W. Barham, court-appointed, Atlanta, Ga., for appellant. John W. Stokes, Jr., U. S. Atty., Allen I. Hirsch, Asst. U. S. Atty., Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

*475Before THORNBERRY, MORGAN and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 430 F.2d 966 [5 Cir., 1970].
